results.code:
24     
25     dockerfile = f"""# Multi-stage build for production optimization
26 FROM {base_image} as base
27 
28 # Set environment variables
29 ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 \\
30     PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1 \\
31     PIP_NO_CACHE_DIR=1 \\
32     PIP_DISABLE_PIP_VERSION_CHECK=1
33 
34 # Install system dependencies
35 RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \\
36     gcc \\
37     g++ \\
38     curl \\
39     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
40 
41 # Install Python dependencies
42 COPY requirements.txt /tmp/requirements.txt
43 RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r /tmp/requirements.txt
44 
45 # Production stage
46 FROM base as production
47 
48 {user_setup}
49 # Set working directory
50 WORKDIR /app
51 
52 # Copy application code
53 COPY src/ /app/src/
54 COPY examples/ /app/examples/
55 COPY README.md /app/
56 COPY pyproject.toml /app/
57 
58 # Install the package
59 RUN pip install -e .
60 
61 # Health check
62 HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \\
63     CMD python -c "from src.reflexion.core.security import health_checker; \\
64                    import sys; \\
65                    result = health_checker.run_health_checks(); \\
66                    sys.exit(0 if result['overall_status'] == 'healthy' else 1)"
67 
68 # Security: Switch to non-root user
69 {"USER reflexion" if config.environment == DeploymentEnvironment.PRODUCTION else ""}
70 
71 # Expose port
72 EXPOSE 8000
73 
74 # Default command
75 CMD ["python", "-m", "uvicorn", "src.reflexion.api.main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
76 """
77
